title: Panotour Pro 2.5 – Create professional-quality virtual tours
content: Panotour Pro enables you to create professional-quality, highly-customized virtual tours in minutes.   Zero programming – Panotour revolutionizes the creation of interactive virtual tours by freeing you from programming tasks. title: The Way 1.07b – Pixel Graphics Action & Adventure Game

title: The Escapists 2 Dungeons and Duct Tape 1.0 – It’s time to bust out of the toughest prisons
content: Risk it all to breakout from the toughest prisons in the world. title: Invoices 3.2 – Manage/print business invoices
content: Invoices is a native Mac-only application to create and manage commercial invoices aimed at small business. Using it, you can create commercial invoices with just simple click operations inserting pre-made values. Customers Products and services as a custom long free-form text description Products and services as rows of a multi item invoices with automatic calculation […]

title: Lost Artifacts: Soulstone 2.0 – An exciting time management game
content: The legendary Soulstone has been stolen from the national museum and Claire, along with her loyal helpers, have witnessed the revival of the terracotta army and an insidious Emperor bent on awakening an ancient dragon and conquering the world! title: Drill 1.3 – Marching Band drill design application
content: Drill is the first Marching Band drill design application built specifically for Mac OS X. Drill offers a sophisticated and full-featured Bézier path tool for designing and editing complex drill formations. The Bézier tool provides precise control over step intervals between cast members as well as step insets at the beginning and end of formations. […]

title: Komodo IDE 11.1.0 – Development environment for PHP, Perl, more
content: Komodo IDE helps developers create great applications using dynamic languages and open technologies. Award-winning tools for debugging, code intelligence, visual code navigation and the regular expression toolkit help developers write cleaner code faster, while source code control integration, a project manager and multi-user support assist in team development.   With improved performance for all supported […]

title: MathMagic Pro for InDesign 9.41 – Equation editor for Adobe InDesign
content: MathMagic Pro for InDesign is an equation editor mainly for use with Adobe InDesign software in editing any mathematical expressions and symbols with WYSIWYG interface and various powerful features. It lets you write or edit equations right inside the InDesign documents without going through export/import. The superior quality and productivity of MathMagic was accepted by […]

title: Twixtor 7.0.2 – Plug-in for After Effects and Premiere Pro
content: Twixtor is a powerful addition in the right hands, as it enables you to slow down or speed up your videos, without producing artifacts and distorting objects.   Change the frame rate of your videos using motion estimation It should also be noted that a powerful video card is recommended for increasing the speed of […]
